author: Markus Spring
content:
A wonderful scenery and excellent image, probably quite difficult to capture and process because of the high contrast situation.

It immediately reminded me of an image of William Eugene Smith, showing a similar composition, but with the kids visible: see http://www.photo-seminars.com/Fame/Fame%20Pixs/wsmith2.jpg
on http://www.photo-seminars.com/Fame/eugesmith.htm
